meanings.definition: A soldier in the cavalry of the Indian army.
meanings.sent1: The sowar rode his horse bravely into battle.
meanings.sent2: The sowar's uniform was adorned with medals.
meanings.sent3: The sowar's horse decided to take a nap in the middle of the battlefield!
meanings.sent4: The sowar was a knight in shining armor, protecting his land.
meanings.sent5: The sowar's presence on the battlefield was majestic and powerful.

meanings.definition: A member of a cavalry unit in the Indian army.
meanings.sent1: Every sowar in the unit was trained to be fearless.
meanings.sent2: The sowar's duty was to protect the borders.
meanings.sent3: The sowar accidentally wore his helmet backward during the parade!
meanings.sent4: The sowar was a vital part of the cavalry's strength and unity.
meanings.sent5: The sowar's loyalty to the unit was unwavering and true.

meanings.definition: A cavalryman in the Indian army.
meanings.sent1: The sowar's horse galloped swiftly across the field.
meanings.sent2: Each sowar was skilled in both combat and horsemanship.
meanings.sent3: The sowar's horse tried to eat his hat during the inspection!
meanings.sent4: The sowar's lance gleamed in the sunlight as he charged forward.
meanings.sent5: The sowar's determination in battle was unmatched by any foe.
